title.rendered: Alexandria Airlines Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
Alexandria airlines are a pioneering in Cairo, Egypt. It is the only privately-owned commercial airline holding a Egyptian Air Operating Certificate (AOC). The company was established in 2006 and commenced its operations in Marsh 2007. It operates scheduled and worldwide charter services flights, mainly to the Middle East, Europe and Africa. It also provides wet lease services to major airlines seeking additional capacity. Its main bases are CAIRO Airport, SSH Airport also.

Verified & Updated on: 18.09.20

Alexandria Airlines Address: Building NO. (2) Metwaly el shaarawy st. square 1139 Ground Floor – Sheraton – Masr Algdida– Cairo- Egypt.

Alexandria Airlines Phone: +202 2266 9325

Alexandria Airlines Fax: + 22685116

Email: Operation Department : samir.elsaid@alexandriaairlines.com

Maintenance Department : mohamed.abdelmonem@alexandriaairlines.com

Commercial Department : fayez.sorikh@alexandriaairlines.com

Accounting Department : ashraf.samy@alexandriaairlines.com

Alexandria Airlines Official website: http://www.alexandriaairlines.com/alexandriaairline.aspx

Alexandria Airlines Baggage Allowance

Alexandria Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Alexandria Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

 Queries handled Alexandria Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Alexandria Airlines Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Alexandria Airlines : (click on the stars below)
